scripts.patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run postinstall && git add . && npx cross-var git commit -m " v$npm_package_version" && git push
scripts.minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run postinstall && git add . && npx cross-var git commit -m " v$npm_package_version" && git push
scripts.major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run postinstall && git add . && npx cross-var git commit -m " v$npm_package_version" && git push
